opinion:
DISPOSITION OF PETITIONS FOR LEAVE TO APPEAL, 101 Ill.2d 562 (1984)Supreme Court of Illinois. 1984.
SEPTEMBER TERM, 1984
(60315) Adams v. Brooks ......................................... Denied. (60264) Amax Zinc Co. v. Illinois Commerce Com. ................. Denied. (60147) American Savings Association v. Conrath ................. Denied. (60102) Antoniou v. Antoniou (Simon, J., took no part.) ......... Denied. (60652) Balassa v. Carmack ...................................... Denied. (60104) Beasley v. Board of Education ........................... Denied. (60607) Bell v. Louisville Nashville R.R. Co. ................. Allowed. (60455) Belvidere National Bank Trust Co. v. Surber-Duffy Chrysler-Dodge, Inc. ..................... Denied. (60415) Bender v. Consolidated Mink Ranch, Inc. ................. Denied. (60170) Benton, City of v. Odom ................................. Denied. (60138) Bertagnoli v. Southern Ry. Co. .......................... Denied.Page 563
